Text.content: With OpenCms 9, it is possible to provide access to the virtual file system of OpenCms via the SMB / CIFS protocol, which is used natively by Microsoft Windows for accessing and providing so-called “network shares”. It is possible to mount such network shares so that they appear as a normal file system on the client machine, both under Windows and Linux. OpenCms 9 uses the JLAN library for this functionality.
